sourcesContent:
import { Component, ChangeDetectionStrategy, inject, computed } from '@angular/core'; import { TranslationService } from '../services/translation.service'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; import { ProjectButtonComponent } from './project-button.component'; // <-- 1. Імпорт @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterModule, ProjectButtonComponent], // <-- 2. Додаємо в imports template: `

{{ ts.t().projects.title }}

public {{ ts.t().projects.donors }}

{{ item.title }}

{{ item.desc }}

Детальніше

volunteer_activism {{ ts.t().projects.probono }}

{{ item.title }}

{{ item.desc }}

Детальніше
`, changeDetection: ChangeDetectionStrategy.OnPush }) export class ProjectsComponent { ts = inject(TranslationService); donorProjects = computed(() => this.ts.t().projects.items.filter((p: any) => p.type === 'donor')); probonoProjects = computed(() => this.ts.t().projects.items.filter((p: any) => p.type === 'probono')); }
